entry.title: Friday night: Near blizzard. Temperature rising to minus 21 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Near blizzard. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature rising to minus 21 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 42 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Blowing snow. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Blowing snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 in the afternoon. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023
